Reviews.Title: “Very nice hotel and friendly English speaking staff”
Reviews.Author: Simona S
Reviews.Content: ive stayed 2 nights cozy hotel perfect 5 minutes topkapi palace aya sofia blue mosque sulthanamet easy visit sites breakfast morning specially enjoyed home cookies natalie reception lady wonderful host helped instructions reach including cevahir mall arrived morning checkin time left checkout time luggage kept reception thank hospitality offered hotel 30 min ataturk airport taxi

Reviews.Title: “Our Stay in Eternity Hotel”
Reviews.Author: Yahia J
Reviews.Content: 1 week istanbul spent 7 nights eternity hotel hotel perfectly situated clean nice staf simply perfect friendliness answering giving lot informations advices move visit breakfast wonderfull cakes jams prepared lady hotel plane ill probably book hotel

Reviews.Title: “Perfect Place to stay in Istanbul”
Reviews.Author: Anne T
Reviews.Content: boutique hotel perfect stay istanbul trip istanbul 2 days stopover friends hotel location couldnt close beautiful famous heritage sites walking distance convenient reach airport close nice restaurants fabulous seaview nice convenient staff extremely friendly helpful family hotel guests reservation process answers quick helpful friendly arrived organized breakfast wonderful amazing variety hotel 10 fresh delicious local specialities try homemade cookies morning lot useful hints sightseeing tour restaurant recommendations jogging dont forget running shoes 5 minutes close seaside promenade

Reviews.Title: “Modern, friendly, perfect for a stay in Old Town.”
Reviews.Author: cchenoweth
Reviews.Content: location block seasons istanbul touristy youre planning stay highly recommend eternity incredibly friendly helpful owners familyowned englishspeaking clean modern quaint unbelievable value thanks pleasant experience

Reviews.Title: “Fond memories...”
Reviews.Author: M P
Reviews.Content: spent week october 2011 eternity booked top floor private terrace wonderful view marmara sea comfortable peaceful watch boats enter bosphorus day quiet location near major sites clean bed extremely comfortable basic breakfast bread coffee cold cuts cheese yogurt fruit served sunny welcoming ground floor option sitting outside staff knowledgeable friendly available help memorable stay thanks especially nathalie

Reviews.Title: “Made a great trip even better... can't wait to return!!!”
Reviews.Author: kenny s
Reviews.Content: wife werent stay visit istanbul quaint cozy streets sultanahmet thriving nite scene tunnel althogh spent nights running tunnel typically fun bars eternity surely glad return peace tranquility hotel eternity woke morning incredible view bosphorus greeted warm friendly hotel staff notably natalie amazing offered recommendations smile yourself favor look eternity convenience attractions scenic views reasonable prices helped vacation memorable

Reviews.Title: “Great staff, hotel and location”
Reviews.Author: gmK2
Reviews.Content: istanbul days hotel agia sofia sultanahmet busy hotels pedestrian road time taxi rank walking tram easier move istanbul heavy rush hour times defiantly hotel pleasure business

Reviews.Title: “We loved everything and we Will definitely return to eternity hotel ."highly recommend”

Reviews.Content: absolutely delightful experience pleasant stay lovely superb cozy boutique hotel staff friendliest hotel staff met istanbul ï�š specially natalie dane lovely lady reception helped lot hooks beautiful smiles clean beds comfortable location excellent sightseeing restaurants easy walking distance main attraction near historical breakfast loved definitely return eternity hotel highly recommend

Reviews.Title: “Hm...”
Reviews.Author: BonnieClyde2024
Reviews.Content: ranking hotel perfect arrived ground floor lobby noisy owner hotel staff understood couldnt offer hotel booked suffered days upgraded days third floor terrace noisy clean save apart hotel centrally located walking distance 5 minutes blue mosque topkapi palace conclusion book via bookingcom dont chose cheapest rate otherwise lobbylevel nice friendly hotel 4

Reviews.Title: “Wonderfull Staff, Great Location, Modern Hotel”
Reviews.Author: ChapmansPeak
Reviews.Content: stayed 4 night oct 2011 couldnt chosen hotel based extreme close proximity major sites topkapi palace aya blue mosque hippodrome literally 510mins walk walking hotel road vibey restaurant bars arasta bazaar 5mins walk shop special hotel inside modern spacious stayed ruby ground floor comfortable beds crisp clean linen bathroom shower head superb coffee tea facilities complimentary bottle wine water fruit wifi available lacking opinion roadside noisy hear call prayer earplugs taxi rank street breakfast cold meats cheeses cereals breads eggs tea coffee scrambled eggs etc extra cost staff friendly helpful herman natalie shopping advice thank stay return
